# Kod

To jest kod.

```{r}
data(wage2,package = 'wooldridge')
View(wage2)

mean(wage2$wage)
mean(wage2$IQ)
sd(wage2$IQ)

results<-lm(wage~IQ,data=wage2)
summary(results)
wagee= 8.3031*15
wagee

results<-lm(lwage~IQ,data=wage2)
summary(results)
wagee = 15*0.0088072
wagee #=13,2108%
```
